entry.tran: (通常在船上玩的)掷环游戏，套圈游戏
entry.def: Quoits is a game which is played by throwing rings over a small post. Quoits is usually played on board ships.
A quoit is a ring used in the game of quoits.

means.word_mean: 1. a game in which quoits or horseshoes are thrown at a stake in the ground in the hope of encircling it

auth_sentence.content: My son, who speaks no Italian, plays quoits with a variety of Roman children.
